core_meaning.normalized_summary: Act from clean intent and correct conduct. Don’t scheme or force outcomes. When you are aligned, momentum returns; when you’re not, any push misfires.

lines.normalized_meaning: Move forward only from a clear, uncontrived place. Innocent advance meets favorable conditions.

lines.normalized_meaning: Results arrive without manipulation. Accept the simple gains and proceed—benefit in any direction when you’re not forcing it.
